oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Wild Cat believed to possess the power of turning itself into a lion. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-23. 8080-8083, and 27. 8399 rev., note). |han=kass'o's grandfather (Tsatsi) told him that when the wild cat is killed and brought home, it turns into a lion and comes to kill the hunter who killed it. 1) |han=kass'o heard this from his maternal grandfather (Tsatsi), 2) See also A wild cat, when many have been killed by a person changes itself into a lion and kills the slayer, 3) This story is found in Book VIII-27.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wildcat turns into a lion
